description:
Sublime Text 2 is a sophisticated text editor for code, html and prose. You'll love the slick user interface and extraordinary features. Sublime Text may be downloaded and evaluated for free, however a license must be purchased for continued use.
    This brings the Sublime Text portable version to your system
summary: Sublime Text 2 is a sophisticated text editor for code, html and prose. You'll love the slick user interface and extraordinary features.
author: Jon Skinner
